channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 10:47 Air alarm to Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 10:47 Air alarm to Sumy Oblast follow the following messages.#Sumy_blast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟠 10:47 Attack Dronov-Kamikadzerukh on the city
